entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
